name: src/audio/BinauralPanner.js
BinauralPanner
description: Binaural panner with multiple sources and a listener.

name: constructor
description:
Constructs an HRTF set. Note that the filter positions are applied
during the load of an HRTF URL.
See {@link HrtfSet}.
See {@link BinauralPanner#loadHrtfSet}.

params.name: options.audioContext
params.description:
mandatory for the creation
of FIR audio buffers

params.name: options.sourcePositions
params.description:
must
be of length options.sourceCount {@link BinauralPanner#sourcePositions}

params.name: options.filterPositions
params.description:
array of positions to filter. Use undefined to use all positions from the HRTF set.
{@link BinauralPanner#filterPositions}

params.name: options.filterAfterLoad
params.description:
true to filter after
full load of SOFA file

name: positionsType
description: Set coordinates type for positions.

name: positionsType
description: Get coordinates type for positions.

name: hrtfSet
description:
Refer an external HRTF set, and update sources. Its positions
coordinate type must be 'gl'.
See {@link HrtfSet}.
See {@link BinauralPanner#update}.

throws.description:
when hrtfSet in undefined or hrtfSet.positionsType is
not 'gl'.

name: hrtfSet
description: Get the HrtfSet.

name: filterPositions
description:
Set the filter positions of the HRTF set
See {@link HrtfSet#filterPositions}.

name: filterPositions
description:
Get the filter positions of the HRTF set
See {@link HrtfSet#filterPositions}.

name: filterPositionsType
description: Set coordinates type for positions.

name: filterPositionsType
description: Get coordinates type for filters.

name: filterAfterLoad
description:
Set post-filtering flag. When false, try to load a partial set of
HRTF.

name: filterAfterLoad
description:
Get post-filtering flag. When false, try to load a partial set of
HRTF.

name: listenerPosition
description:
Set listener position. It will update the relative positions of the
sources after a call to the update method.
Default value is [0, 0, 0] in 'gl' coordinates.
See {@link BinauralPanner#update}.

name: listenerPosition
description: Get listener position.

name: listenerUp
description:
Set listener up direction (not an absolute position). It will update
the relative positions of the sources after a call to the update
method.
Default value is [0, 1, 0] in 'gl' coordinates.
See {@link BinauralPanner#update}.

name: listenerUp
description: Get listener up direction.

name: listenerView
description:
Set listener view, as an aiming position. It is an absolute position,
and not a direction. It will update the relative positions of the
sources after a call to the update method.
Default value is [0, 0, -1] in 'gl' coordinates.
See {@link BinauralPanner#update}.

name: listenerView
description: Get listener view direction.

name: sourcePositions
description:
Set the sources positions. It will update the relative positions after
a call to the update method.
See {@link BinauralPanner#update}.
See {@link BinauralPanner#setSourcePositionByIndex}.

throws.description:
if the length of positionsRequest is not the same as
the number of sources

name: sourcePositions
description: Get the source positions.

name: setSourcePositionByIndex
description:
Set the position of one source. It will update the corresponding
relative position after a call to the update method.
See {@link BinauralPanner#update}.

name: getSourcePositionByIndex
description: Get the position of one source.

name: loadHrtfSet
description:
Load an HRTF set form an URL, and update sources.
See {@link HrtfSet#load}.

name: connectInputByIndex
description: Connect the input of a source.

name: disconnectInputByIndex
description: Disconnect the input of one source.

name: disconnectInputs
description: Disconnect the input of each source.

name: connectOutputByIndex
description: Connect the output of a source.

name: disconnectOutputByIndex
description: Disconnect the output of a source.

name: connectOutputs
description:
Connect each output of each source. Note that the number of nodes to
connect must match the number of sources.
See {@link BinauralPanner#connectOutputByIndex}.

name: disconnectOutputs
description: Disconnect the output of each source.

name: update
description:
Update the sources filters, according to possible changes in listener,
and source positions.

name: src/audio/Source.js
Source
description:
Single source.
See {@link BinauralPanner}.

name: constructor
description:
Construct a source, with and AudioContext and an HrtfSet.
See {@link HrtfSet}.

params.name: options.audioContext
params.description:
mandatory for the creation
of FIR audio buffers

name: crossfadeDuration
description: Set the crossfade duration when the position changes.

name: crossfadeDuration
description: Get the crossfade duration when the position changes.

name: hrtfSet
description: Refer an external HRTF set.

name: hrtfSet
description: Get the HrtfSet.

name: position
description: Set the position of the source and updates.

name: connectInput
description: Connect the input of a source.

name: disconnectInput
description: Disconnect the input of a source.

name: connectOutput
description: Connect the output of a source.

name: disconnectOutput
description: Disconnect the output of a source.

name: src/audio/index.js
src/audio/utilities.js
dBToLin
description: Convert a dB value to a linear amplitude, i.e. -20dB gives 0.1

name: createDiracBuffer
description:
Create a Dirac buffer, zero-padded.
Warning: the default length is 2 samples,
to by-pass a bug in Safari  9.

name: createNoiseBuffer
description: Create a noise buffer.

name: resampleFloat32Array
description: Convert an array, typed or not, to a Float32Array, with possible re-sampling.

name: src/common/index.js
src/common/utilities.js
almostEquals
description: Test whether a value is around a reference, given a tolerance.

name: almostEqualsModulo
description:
Test whether a value is around a reference, given a tolerance and a
modulo.

name: src/geometry/KdTree.js
distanceSquared
description:
Get the squared distance between to points.
(Avoid computing the square-root when unnecessary.)

name: distance
description: Get the distance between to points.

name: src/geometry/coordinates.js
coordinates
description:
Coordinates as an array of 3 values:
[x, y, z] or [azimuth, elevation, distance], depending on type

name: coordinatesType
description: Coordinates system type: sofaCartesian', 'sofaSpherical', or'gl'.

name: sofaCartesianToGl
description: Convert SOFA cartesian coordinates to openGL.

name: glToSofaCartesian
description: Convert openGL coordinates to SOFA cartesian.

name: sofaCartesianToSofaSpherical
description: Convert SOFA cartesian coordinates to SOFA spherical.

name: sofaSphericalToSofaCartesian
description: Convert SOFA spherical coordinates to SOFA spherical.

name: sofaSphericalToGl
description: Convert SOFA spherical coordinates to openGL.

name: glToSofaSpherical
description: Convert openGL coordinates to SOFA spherical.

name: typedToSofaCartesian
description: Convert typed coordinates to SOFA cartesian.

name: typedToGl
description: Convert typed coordinates to openGL.

name: glToTyped
description: Convert openGL coordinates to typed ones.

name: src/geometry/degree.js
toRadianFactor
description: Degree to radian multiplication factor.

name: fromRadianFactor
description: Radian to degree multiplication factor.

name: toRadian
description: Convert an angle in degrees to radians.

name: fromRadian
description: Convert an angle in radians to degrees.

name: cos
description: Get the cosinus of an angle in degrees.

name: sin
description: Get the sinus of an angle in degrees.

name: atan2
description: Get the arc-tangent (2 arguments) of 2 angles in degrees.

name: src/geometry/index.js
src/index.js
src/sofa/HrtfSet.js
HrtfSet
description: Container for HRTF set.

name: constructor
description:
Constructs an HRTF set. Note that the filter positions are applied
during the load of an URL.
See {@link HrtfSet#load}.

params.name: options.audioContext
params.description:
mandatory for the creation
of FIR audio buffers

params.name: options.filterPositions
params.description:
{@link HrtfSet#filterPositions}
array of positions to filter. Use undefined to use all positions.

params.name: options.filterAfterLoad

name: positionsType
description: Set coordinates type for positions.

name: positionsType
description: Get coordinates type for positions.

name: filterPositionsType
description: Set coordinates type for filter positions.

name: filterPositionsType
description: Get coordinates type for filter positions.

name: filterPositions
description: Set filter positions.

name: filterPositions
description: Get filter positions.

name: filterAfterLoad
description:
Set post-filtering flag. When false, try to load a partial set of
HRTF.

name: filterAfterLoad
description:
Get post-filtering flag. When false, try to load a partial set of
HRTF.

name: isReady
description:
Test whether an HRTF set is actually loaded.
See {@link HrtfSet#load}.

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} false before any successful load, true after.

return.description: false before any successful load, true after.

name: sofaUrl
description: Get the URL used to actually load the HRTF set.

unknown.tagValue: {String} that is undefined before a successfully load.

return.description: that is undefined before a successfully load.

name: sofaSampleRate
description: Get the original sample-rate from the SOFA URL already loaded.

unknown.tagValue: {Number} that is undefined before a successfully load.

return.description: that is undefined before a successfully load.

name: sofaMetaData
description: Get the meta-data from the SOFA URL already loaded.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} that is undefined before a successfully load.

return.description: that is undefined before a successfully load.

name: applyFilterPositions
description:
Apply filter positions to an existing set of HRTF. (After a successful
load.)
This is destructive.
See {@link HrtfSet#load}.

name: load
description: Load an URL and generate the corresponding set of IR buffers.

unknown.tagValue:
{Promise.<this|Error>} resolve when the URL sucessfully
loaded.

return.description:
resolve when the URL sucessfully
loaded.

properties.name: index
properties.description: original index in the SOFA set

name: nearest
description:
Get the nearest point in the HRTF set, after a successful load.
See {@link HrtfSet#load}.

name: nearestFir
description:
Get the FIR AudioBuffer that corresponds to the closest position in
the set.

name: _createKdTree
description: Creates a kd-tree out of the specified indices, positions, and FIR.

name: _generateIndicesPositionsFirs
description: Asynchronously create Float32Arrays, with possible re-sampling.

throws.description: assertion that the channel count is 2

name: _loadDataSet
description: Try to load a data set from a SOFA URL.

name: _loadMetaAndPositions
description:
Try to load meta-data and positions from a SOFA URL, to get the
indices closest to the filter positions.

name: _loadSofaFull
description: Try to load full SOFA URL.

name: _loadSofaPartial
description: Try to load partial data from a SOFA URL.

name: _setMetaData
description: Set meta-data.

name: _sourcePositionsToGl
description: Convert to GL coordinates, in-place.

name: src/sofa/ServerDataBase.js
ServerDataBase
description: SOFA remote data-base.

name: constructor
description:
This is only a constructor, it does not load any thing.
See {@link ServerDataBase#loadCatalogue}.

params.name: options.serverUrl
params.description:
base URL of server, including
protocol, eg. 'http://bili2.ircam.fr'.

name: loadCatalogue
description:
Asynchronously load complete catalogue from the server, including the
catalogue links found in any partial catalogue.

unknown.tagValue:
{Promise.<String|Error>} The promise will resolve (with
sourceUrl) when every sub-catalogue will successfully load, or will
reject (with an error) as soon as one transfer fails.

params.name: sourceUrl
params.description:
URL of the root catalogue, including the
server, like 'http://bili2.ircam.fr/catalog.xml'.
 Default is 'catalog.xml' at serverURL supplied at
{@link ServerDataBase#constructor}.

params.name: destination
params.description:
Catalogue to update. Default is
internal.

return.description:
The promise will resolve (with
sourceUrl) when every sub-catalogue will successfully load, or will
reject (with an error) as soon as one transfer fails.

name: getUrls
description:
Get URLs, possibly filtered.
Any filter can be partial, and is case-insensitive. The result must
match every supplied filter. Undefined filters are not applied.

params.name: options.freePattern
params.description:
any pattern matched
globally. Use separators (spaces, tabs, etc.) to combine multiple
patterns: '44100 listen' will restrict on URLs matching '44100' and
'listen'

name: getDataSetDefinitions
description: Get all source positions of a given URL.

unknown.tagValue:
{Promise.<Object|String>} The promise will resolve after
successfully loading, with definitions as * `{definition: {key: values}}`
objects; the promise will reject is the transfer fails, with an error.

params.name: sourceUrl
params.description:
is the complete SOFA URL, with the
server, like
'http://bili2.ircam.fr/SimpleFreeFieldHRIR/BILI/COMPENSATED/44100/IRC_1100_C_HRIR.sofa'

return.description:
The promise will resolve after
successfully loading, with definitions as * `{definition: {key: values}}`
objects; the promise will reject is the transfer fails, with an error.

name: getSourcePositions
description: Get all source positions of a given URL.

unknown.tagValue:
{Promise.<Array<Array.<Number>>|Error>} The promise will resolve
after successfully loading, with an array of positions (which are
arrays of 3 numbers); the promise will reject is the transfer fails,
with an error.

params.name: sourceUrl
params.description:
is the complete SOFA URL, with the
server, like
'http://bili2.ircam.fr/SimpleFreeFieldHRIR/BILI/COMPENSATED/44100/IRC_1100_C_HRIR.sofa'

return.description:
The promise will resolve
after successfully loading, with an array of positions (which are
arrays of 3 numbers); the promise will reject is the transfer fails,
with an error.

Parses a SOFA JSON string with into an object with `data` and `metaData`

name: conformSofaType
